question: Pandit Arun Bhaduri, who recently passed away, was a maestro in which of the following Indian performing arts?
explanation: Pandit Arun Bhaduri (75), the renowned Hindustani classical singer, has passed away in Kolkata, West Bengal on December 17, 2018. He is considered to be one of the masters of Bengali songs and Bhajans.  Bhaduri was an exponent on Kirana and Rampur Gharana. He  has fused all these styles beautifully to create an inimitable style of his own. Some notable disciples of Him are Koushik Bhattacharjee, Kasturi Bandopadhyay, Tushar Dutta, Indrani Mukherjee and many more.
